properties.Name: Cargill
properties.Description: the world's leading distributor of all kinds of agricultural goods
properties.Issue: was accused in 2005 of using child labor on cocoa plantations in Africa

properties.Name: Bayer
properties.Issue: has been accused of promoting and selling hazardous agricultural products (such as weedkillers) that have damaged the health of vulnerable farmworkers in the U.S.

properties.Name: John Deere
properties.Description: a producer of agricultural equipment and machinery
properties.Issue: retains a tight hold over the rights to its equipment, causing economic and professional difficulties for tens of thousands of smaller farmers who are forced to rely on their equipment for their livelihoods

properties.Name: Syngenta
properties.Description: one of the world's largest seed suppliers
properties.Issue: was accused of exposing Hawaiian farmers to dangerous pesticides on two separate occasions

properties.Name: BASF
properties.Issue: was complicit in a venture that sold 67 hazardous pesticides to wine and grape farmers in South Africa

properties.Name: Nutrien
properties.Issue: applied the herbicide dicamba illegally on several Kansas farms, causing them to be fined
